project_descr: Persistent Organic Pollutants in Niue is an Enabling Activity to meet its obligations under the Stockholm convention on POPs

outputs.output_descr: Output 1: Prepare Assessments on the National Infrastructural and Institutional Capacity, POPs Inventories and the National Implementation Plan that sets Objectives and Priorities for POPs Reduction and Elimination Options.

project_title: persistent organic pollutants (pops) project in niue
